channel.title: Bayesian on Jack E Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian on Jack E Taylor

item.title: Data-Driven ROPE Analysis
item.description: About this post I’ve decided to write a brief disclaimer about this post. Please don’t use this post for statistical advice. This post was mostly thinking out loud about a possible method of hypothesis testing, but in fact it just reinvents existing methods in a noisy way. Looking at the post again a few months later, I think it doesn’t tell us anything we can’t already get from existing methods.
